snippet: It was an otherworldly 28 hours for David Freese, who grew up as a Cardinals fan in Missouri and who was named M.V.P. of the World Series.
lead_paragraph: It was an otherworldly 28 hours for David Freese, who grew up as a Cardinals fan in Missouri and who was named M.V.P. of the World Series.

headline.main: Freese Is Most Valuable, and Most Improbable
headline.print_headline: Freese Is Most Valuable, and Most Improbable
